Button.Name: CreateButton
Button.Tooltip: :92dc571fa6da9925:Press create with a recipe selected to begin item creation. Target a player to begin commissioned work.

Button.Name: CreateButton
Button.Tooltip: :695e7512c4d0a720:Press experiment with a item selected to begin experimentation.

Button.Name: CreateEnableButton
Button.Tooltip: Reenable the create button. Workaround for a bug when crafting multiple commissions. Do not use in other circumstances!
